data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rabeler, Richard K., Wagner, Warren L. (2016): New combinations in Odontostemma (Caryophyllaceae). PhytoKeys 63: 77-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.63.8181, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.63.8181
